name: Biological Sciences First Year Seminars
description: Various seminars are offered that introduce first-year students to current topics of modern biology. These are mini courses that meet for half a semester. Topics have included: Proteins in Disease, Genes and Diseases, Pills and Poisons, Curing Cancer, Organ Transplantation & Blood Substitutes, and Prions — Mad Cows and Englishman. Courses restricted to first year students in the Mellon College of Science.
